scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: dotenv -e .env -- concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cross-env-shell PORT=$PORT npm run dev --prefix backend
scripts.dev:frontend: cross-env-shell PORT=$VITE_PORT npm run dev --prefix frontend -- --port $VITE_PORT
scripts.typecheck: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,green" "npm run typecheck --prefix backend" "npm run typecheck --prefix frontend"
